description:
Would like to raise your children to be creative, independent, smart and mature? Then this course if for you.

This course will cover homeschooling (and unschooling) for ages four to eighteen and beyond. It is broken into seven sections. They are:

  • Course Overview
  • Before You Homeschool
  • Getting Started
  • Keeping Records
  • The Socialization Questions
  • College/Employment Bound
  • Troubleshooting

By the end of this course, you will:

  • Have a better understanding of what homeschooling is
  • Be familiar with other educational options
  • Have the tools you need to make the best educational choices for your children

This course has over two hours of video lectures, articles, quizzes and other resources.
title: Raising Creative Thinkers
